item.title: Cpu Word Length
item.description: 计算机中word的正解 Buses are typically designed to transfer fixed-sized chunks of bytes known as words. The number of bytes in a word (the word size) is a fundamental system parameter that varies across systems. Most machines today have word sizes of either 4 bytes (32 bits)or8bytes(64bits). 翻译过来就是说： 总线一般被设计
